name: Near a Tomato
description:
WOAH! It's like metroid and megaman because we're not good at coming up with original mechanics ideas.

This was made for the University of Birmingham Game Development Society's 1Up Jam under the theme "Not human".

A controller using a d-pad is strongly recommended.

Keyboard controls:

Arrow keys to move, down to duck, x to jump, shift to run, c to shoot.

Xbox Controller controls:

A to jump, X to shoot, LB to run, dpad down to duck.

Most controllers are supported, the corresponding controls are whatever buttons are in equivalent locations.

f1 toggles fullscreen mode.
